candidates.name: Max Baxter
candidates.why_elect: I am a good elected representative because I have significant governance experience, I am pragmatic and incredibly proud of where I live. My honesty, integrity and welcoming personality are great attributes in the governance role I hold as mayor.
candidates.why_stand: I love our district and having been our mayor for the last 6 years I have learnt an incredible amount, through experience, contacts made and the passion I have I am the best person to lead our district in the next term.

candidates.name: Doreen de Haan
candidates.why_elect: I have a heart and soul for the community. I am a good listener and respect what people have to say. I am an organiser of events. I was Rural councillor for Otorohanga District Council 1998-2007.
candidates.why_stand: Otorohanga wants a central Mayor. I live 12 kms west of Otorohanga, in Honikiwi and I call that central. Shopping is done in Otorohanga, from farm supplies, animal supplies, clothing, food and nearly everything else. I have lived in this district for 34 years. I am a local candidate for Mayor.
